 Dr. Ing. Daniel Jussen

Dynamic out of the box thinking engineer specialize d at the interface between engineering and life-

quality management and work in GMP controlled envir onment; development of complex laboratory 
equipment and biotechnology research tools; design of microfluidic reactions systems; scale up/down of  
biotechnology processes, process development and op eration.
Work experience 
 
• 2020 _– tto date Senior Engineer at Pharmaplan

(NNE till 4/2019)

chemistry and Biotechnology Wädenswil (CH)

Education

Geowissenschaften 1 of the Forschungszentrum 
Jülich GmbH and RWTH Aachen  
Development of a Microfluidic Magnetic Oscillation 
Reactor for Enzymes

at University Bielefeld 
Master’s thesis: Optimizing the Streptavi-
dinproduction with Streptomyces avidinii  
 
• 2004 _–_2007 _Bachelor in Molecular 
Biotechnology at University Bielefeld  
Bachelor’s thesis: Optimizing a Streptavidin assay 
based on Biotin-4-Fluorescein

Gesamtschule Rastede 
 Stays abroad

American (9500 km; Prudhoe Bay (Alaska), USA to

of Chemical Engineering and Technology at 
University of Zagreb

University, Hamilton New Zealand

process equipment

• Quality Control during commissioning

for piping (endoscopic and X-ray) 
 
 
 
 
 
Dr. Ing. Daniel Jussen 
 
Winznauer Str. 73, 4632 Trimbach (CH), Cell-phone: + 49 176 233 875 73, E-Mail: jussendaniel@aol.com
